message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product, but that's the lowest I'm willing to go. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that.  Could you do $13,000? I'm willing to compromise to make this deal work.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $12,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
